"Etoile Class Aptitude Test I":
"This is a test to judge whether an ARKS
is suitable for the Etoile class. This will
allow you to bypass the ability restriction.
By achieving the stated objective, even
further improvement is possible.

※From the Quest Counter
Select Training Quests
and clear [Etoile Basics]
※Etoile's level cap increases to 40."
